docs.title: MKB2 - The Mechanical Keyboard Master Knowledge Base
docs.text:
MKB2 aims to be the ultimate resource for everyone getting into the hobby of mechanical keyboards, either off-the-shelf or custom made.

Here you will (hopefully) find everything you need to know to choose your new mechanical keyboard or to build your own (almost) from scratch.

docs.title: What is a mechanical keyboard anyways?
docs.text: A PC Keyboard can belong to one of two main categories, differentiating themselves by their actuation mechanism, being: + membrane + mechanical

docs.title: Membrane keyboards
docs.text:
Membrane keyboards have been (and still are) the staple keyboard for everyone. Think of a laptop keyboard, or those cheap keyboards you can find in every office or school lab. Yup, pretty much each of those is a membrane keyboard.

Pros of membrane keyboardsCons of membrane keyboards
  • They're cheap
  • They're relatively quiet
  • They DO feel cheap
  • The whole keeb needs to be replaced when the membrane is damaged
